original_text: Thou hast played the whore also with the Assyrians, because thou wast unsatiable; yea, thou hast played the harlot with them, and yet couldest not be satisfied.
korean_text: 네가 음욕이 차지 아니하여 또 앗수르 사람과 행음하고 그들과 행음하고도 아직도 부족하게 여겨

sentences.original_text: Thou hast played the whore also with the Assyrians
yea, thou hast played the harlot with them
and yet couldest not be satisfied
